# Incendiary Veil
## Overview
**Incendiary Veil:** This augmentation works like *[[Fog Veil|fog veil]]*, except that a 10-foot-thick cloud of burning smoke extends out from the chosen side. Any creature in the smoke takes 4d6 points of fire damage every round. (Reflex save DC 22 halves.)

*Caster Level:* 15th; *Prerequisites:* [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Incendiary Cloud (Spell)|incendiary cloud]]; Market Price:* 60,000 gp.
